result.title: Tanya and Password 288 DIV2 D
result.content: I am trying to solve this I learned about euler path . I understood how we make a edge between s[0]s[1]->s[1]s[2] and we have calculated whether a euler path exist or not . if it exist we did dfs i can't understand this type of dfs . if somebody can help me solving this somebody's accepted code
